Subject: Re: [neat] Re: Quick Note on Maintaining Diversity

X-Yahoo-Profile: alienseedpod

Hi Ken,

My belief at this time is that a more explicit method of maintaining
diversity over a space defined by multiple objectives (as I've been
writing about recently) is the way forward, but that this slackening
of the cut-off percentage in our current code bases gets us some of
the benefits of that approach.

My hope is that I'll be able to produce some empirical evidence to
back up my thoughts in the not too distant future.

Regards,

Colin.
